ValidationRule.description: Cannot close Order Creation case as No Response if Missing/Incorrect Information is not populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.Name = "Order Creation", ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Reason , "No Response"),
ISPICKVAL( Missing_Incorrect__c ,"" ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The case cannot be closed as No Response if the Missing/Incorrect Information field is blank.
